title: Woman arrested with forged US visa
body_lines: A 64-year-old woman was arrested yesterday for attempting to flee to America with a forged US visa, the police said.
They said the woman from Battaramulla was arrested by the officers attached to the police Crime Investigations department for possessing a forged US visa.
She was released on bail with two sureties of Rs.500,000 each after being produced at Negombo Magistrate court yesterday.
